description: An Experiment Method Supporting File is a File that contains additional information relevant for the Experiment Method, such as (unstructured) protocols.

ega_accession.description: The EGA accession ID of an entity.

format.description: The file format of the Supporting File (e.g., TXT, JSON).

included_in_submission.description: Whether a File is included in the Submission or not.

title: ExperimentMethodSupportingFile
